attributes.background: Find money for medication for people who have been  diagnosed with adhd and are suffering while being told there is no funding for their treatment.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Hold a Public Inquiry into the shortage of ADHD medication: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650973

Subsidise the cost of private prescriptions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/642509
